concat.scalar: Please check your Customer ID and password in passbook and provide it correctly. If you still facing any troubles please contact our bank service providers.

We have 3 categories of services.


  1. General Banking
  2. Tax Services
  3. Other Services

Please contact our Bank Service provider for further information.
The daily transaction Default limit for the day is Rs. 5 Lakh. There is no maximum limit for Funds Transfer. You can enhance your daily limit upto 50 lakhs through the InternetÂ Banking.
Charges are applicable dependent of the type of transfer. You will see the charges applicable prior to submitting the fund transferÂ request.

The funds are transferred to any Axis Bank account instantly on a best effort basis

Funds transferred through IMPS will get credited immediately

Funds transferred to any other bank account before cut-off time will be credited on the same day, post cut-off time, the same would be credited on the nextÂ workingÂ day.

concat.scalar: The Indian Financial System Code (IFSC) is an RBI issued code which is being used in the NEFT system to identify recipient bank branches. While selecting the payee's branch, it is essential that the IFSC code mentioned against the branch be the same as the IFSC of the branch you want your funds to be transferred to.
The IFSC is mentioned on cheque books on every cheque leaf below the Bank nameÂ andÂ address.

concat.scalar:
Please take the following documents and Approach the closest branch


  1. Two documents in the name of the sole proprietorship firm confirming the name and address â€” issued by a Government authority/ department, as registration/ license document
  2. PAN Card
  3. Identity and address proof of the sole proprietor
  4. Account opening Cheque from existing Current Account
  5. Passport Size Photos

Please take the following documents and head to the nearest branch


  1. Partnership deed.
  2. Partnership Letter.
  3. PAN cards of the partners
  4. List of beneficial owners holding more than 15% in the firm (on letterhead).
  5. Passport Size photos
  6. Communication Address Proof of the partners.
  7. Account opening Cheque from existing Current Account.
